net.iso2013.peapi.api.packet

Interface EntityPacketFactory


  • public interface EntityPacketFactory
    Since:
    2018-04-23
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    iso2013

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EntityAnimationPacket createAnimationPacket(EntityIdentifier entity, EntityAnimationPacket.AnimationType type)
      Create an animation packet using an entity identifier and an animation type.
      EntityClickPacket createClickPacket(EntityIdentifier entity, EntityClickPacket.ClickType type)
      Create an inbound click packet using an entity identifier.
      EntityDataPacket createDataPacket(EntityIdentifier entity)
      Create a data packet using the entity identifier.
      EntityDestroyPacket createDestroyPacket(EntityIdentifier... entities)
      Creates a packet that destroys all of the entities given by the entity identifiers.
      EntityPotionAddPacket createEffectAddPacket(EntityIdentifier identifier, org.bukkit.potion.PotionEffect effect)
      Creates a packet that will add a potion to a given entity for a client.
      EntityPotionRemovePacket createEffectRemovePacket(EntityIdentifier identifier, org.bukkit.potion.PotionEffectType type)
      Creates a packet that will remove a given potion type for a given entity for a client.
      EntityPacket[] createEntitySpawnPacket(EntityIdentifier identifier)
      Creates an array of packets that will spawn an entity and send the data (if applicable) for a client.
      EntityEquipmentPacket[] createEquipmentPacket(EntityIdentifier entity, org.bukkit.inventory.EntityEquipment equipment)
      Creates a set of packets that will send out a set of equipment for an entity
      EntityEquipmentPacket createEquipmentPacket(EntityIdentifier entity, org.bukkit.inventory.EquipmentSlot slot, org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
      Creates a packet that will modify one equipment slot of an entity.
      EntityMountPacket createMountPacket(EntityIdentifier vehicle, EntityIdentifier... passengers)
      Creates a mount packet that will update a vehicle's passengers
      EntityMovePacket createMovePacket(EntityIdentifier identifier, org.bukkit.util.Vector location, org.bukkit.util.Vector direction, boolean onGround, EntityMovePacket.MoveType type)
      Creates a packet that will move the given entity to a given location and direction for a client.
      EntityPacket[] createObjectSpawnPacket(EntityIdentifier identifier)
      Creates an array of packets that will spawn an object and send the data (if applicable) for a client.
      EntityStatusPacket createStatusPacket(EntityIdentifier entity, byte status)
      Creates a packet that will update a given entity's status for a client.

    • Method Detail

      • createAnimationPacket

        EntityAnimationPacket createAnimationPacket(EntityIdentifier entity,
                                            EntityAnimationPacket.AnimationType type)
        Create an animation packet using an entity identifier and an animation type.
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity to control in the packet
        type - the type of animation to send
        Returns:
        the constructed packet

      • createClickPacket

        EntityClickPacket createClickPacket(EntityIdentifier entity,
                                    EntityClickPacket.ClickType type)
        Create an inbound click packet using an entity identifier.
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity to control in the packet
        type - the click type of the packet to be constructed
        Returns:
        the constructed packet

      • createDataPacket

        EntityDataPacket createDataPacket(EntityIdentifier entity)
        Create a data packet using the entity identifier. Data will be pulled from the identifier by default only if the identifier targets a fake entity. Otherwise, you must modify the data manually.
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity to control in the packet
        Returns:
        the constructed packet

      • createDestroyPacket

        EntityDestroyPacket createDestroyPacket(EntityIdentifier... entities)
        Creates a packet that destroys all of the entities given by the entity identifiers.
        Parameters:
        entities - the entities to be removed
        Returns:
        the constructed packet

      • createEquipmentPacket

        EntityEquipmentPacket[] createEquipmentPacket(EntityIdentifier entity,
                                              org.bukkit.inventory.EntityEquipment equipment)
        Creates a set of packets that will send out a set of equipment for an entity
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity to control in the packet
        equipment - the equipment to be sent
        Returns:
        the constructed packet

      • createEquipmentPacket

        EntityEquipmentPacket createEquipmentPacket(EntityIdentifier entity,
                                            org.bukkit.inventory.EquipmentSlot slot,
                                            org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
        Creates a packet that will modify one equipment slot of an entity.
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity to modify
        slot - the slot to change
        item - the new item to put in the slot
        Returns:
        the constructed packet

      • createMountPacket

        EntityMountPacket createMountPacket(EntityIdentifier vehicle,
                                    EntityIdentifier... passengers)
        Creates a mount packet that will update a vehicle's passengers
        Parameters:
        vehicle - the vehicle whose passengers will be set
        passengers - the passengers to put onto the vehicle
        Returns:
        the constructed packet

      • createEntitySpawnPacket

        EntityPacket[] createEntitySpawnPacket(EntityIdentifier identifier)
        Creates an array of packets that will spawn an entity and send the data (if applicable) for a client.
        Do not use this method to spawn objects - use createObjectSpawnPacket(EntityIdentifier) instead. This one will just throw an error.
        Parameters:
        identifier - the entity to be created
        Returns:
        the constructed packets

      • createObjectSpawnPacket

        EntityPacket[] createObjectSpawnPacket(EntityIdentifier identifier)
        Creates an array of packets that will spawn an object and send the data (if applicable) for a client.
        Do not use this method to spawn entities - use createEntitySpawnPacket(EntityIdentifier) instead . This one will just throw an error.
        Parameters:
        identifier - the object to be created
        Returns:
        the constructed packets

      • createStatusPacket

        EntityStatusPacket createStatusPacket(EntityIdentifier entity,
                                      byte status)
        Creates a packet that will update a given entity's status for a client.
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity whose status should be updated
        status - the new status to be set
        Returns:
        the constructed packet

      • createEffectAddPacket

        EntityPotionAddPacket createEffectAddPacket(EntityIdentifier identifier,
                                            org.bukkit.potion.PotionEffect effect)
        Creates a packet that will add a potion to a given entity for a client.
        Parameters:
        identifier - the entity who should gain a potion effect
        effect - the effect to be added
        Returns:
        the constructed packet

      • createEffectRemovePacket

        EntityPotionRemovePacket createEffectRemovePacket(EntityIdentifier identifier,
                                                  org.bukkit.potion.PotionEffectType type)
        Creates a packet that will remove a given potion type for a given entity for a client.
        Parameters:
        identifier - the entity who should lose the potion effect
        type - the type to be removed
        Returns:
        the constructed packet

      • createMovePacket

        EntityMovePacket createMovePacket(EntityIdentifier identifier,
                                  org.bukkit.util.Vector location,
                                  org.bukkit.util.Vector direction,
                                  boolean onGround,
                                  EntityMovePacket.MoveType type)
        Creates a packet that will move the given entity to a given location and direction for a client.
        Parameters:
        identifier - the entity who should be moved
        location - the location to move the entity to
        direction - the direction the entity should be facing
        onGround - whether or not the entity is on the ground
        type - the type of movement to perform
        Returns:
        the constructed packet
